title: 45. "The Truth" Seeking Validation & Validating Yourself
description:
Hey girl!

In this episode, we talk about validation. Why do you feel like you need validation? How do you release the need for validation? Why do you seek validation? In this episode, I address all these questions and much, much more?

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Book of the Month: If the Buddha Dated: A Handbook for Finding Love on the Spiritual Path by Charlotte Karl

Click here to order your copy of the Inner Child Healing Affirmations and Guided Meditations combo pack

Website: www.beatricekamau.com
